entry.title: O, Weaver of Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: fyodvvr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,902Chapters: 3/35Kudos: 6

Summary: 3 years after making a deal with a broken man you end up rediscovering the field of medicine. While seeking to recover from permanent amnesia you find yourself transferred from a local ER to Gotham's General Hospital - the life you thought you had established crumbles.You see the world in strings, not those of fate, but of souls, shifting and knotting through fragile bodies. As strange dreams bleed into waking hours, shadows of forgotten friends stir, and their faces seem to know you too well. Memory calls from the dark, whispering truths you wished were left buried. Will you remember what was lost or lose yourself to the madness that waits behind it?

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,323Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 12

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you’d take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn’t matter to you. If they needed help, they got it. When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,675Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 19

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly)

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,479Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.summary:
Author: balloongiirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,239Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 52

If your clothes were off, Jason bet it fell just below your navel. You had the cutest set of cotton shorts under your dress. You were so holy, so perfect." or, father jason crawled out of his grave years ago. now, he's a man of faith. that is, until he sees you.

entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,282Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 69

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid.You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions.They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,410Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 656

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,694Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two ending depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,858Chapters: 7/18Kudos: 104

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.
